Docs.summary: A convention that finds backing fields for properties based on their names: * <[property name]>k__BackingField * _[camel-cased property name] * _[property name] * m_[camel-cased property name] * m_[property name] * [property name]_

remarks.para: The field type must be of a type that's assignable to or from the property type. If more than one matching field is found an exception is thrown.
See Model building conventions for more information and examples.
